title: Stage Lv6-P6-S37
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: So beautiful was the view that we couldn't believe our eyes.
Gone are the days when we could travel freely.
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 경치가 너무 아름다워서 우리는 눈을 믿을 수 없었습니다.
sentences.en: So beautiful was the view that we couldn't believe our eyes.

sentences.kr: 자유롭게 여행할 수 있던 시절은 지나갔습니다.
sentences.en: Gone are the days when we could travel freely.

sentences.kr: 기술의 영향이 너무 커서 산업 전체를 혁신시켰습니다.
sentences.en: Such was the impact of the technology that it revolutionized the industry.

sentences.kr: 결과가 너무 놀라워서 모든 사람이 충격을 받았습니다.
sentences.en: So surprising were the results that everyone was shocked.
Gone are the times when simple competition could solve everything.

sentences.kr: 성공이 너무 갑작스러워서 팀 전체가 당황했습니다.
sentences.en: So sudden was the success that the entire team was taken aback.

sentences.kr: 우리가 전통적인 방법에만 의존하던 시절은 지나갔습니다.
sentences.en: Gone are the days when we relied solely on traditional methods.

sentences.kr: 변화가 너무 급격해서 모든 계획을 재검토해야 했습니다.
sentences.en: So rapid was the change that we had to review all our plans.
